name: ALL ABOUT TACOS AT MEXICO CITY
description: we start in a meeting point called Bellas Artes at the down town: street juarez with street eje central... Join us tasting tongue tacos, pork tacos... we love tacos, that's the reason that if you want a real taste of mexico city this tour is the best for you, a local tour guide will take you walking having a nice conversation, so this is your opportunity to ask all about mexico city and the highlights. at the end we visit the local market to have a nice coffee...
